summary: SummaryGalatÃ©e Confort Comforting Milky CrÃ¨me Cleanser by LancÃ´me is a smooth & gentle. This emollient-rich, milky cream cleanser gently melts away makeup and impurities.
details: DetailsFeaturesEmollient-rich and milky cream cleanserInstantly comforting formula to condition and pamper skinBenefitsSmooth and gentle, this emollient-rich, milky cream cleanser gently melts away makeup and impuritiesContains honey and sweet almond extracts to condition and pamper skin, leaving it feeling clean, silky-soft and soothedItem 2235579IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Paraffinum Liquidum / Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale, Isopropyl Myristate, Propylene Glycol, Zea Mays / Corn Germ Oil, Lecithin, Cyclodextrin, Hydroxycitronellal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Phenoxyethanol, Wheat Germ Glycerides, Faex / Yeast Extract / Extrait De Levure, Ethylparaben, Triethanolamine, Mel / Honey / Miel, Polysorbate 20, Limonene, Mannitol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone Carbomer, Geraniol, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Disodium Succinate, Methylparaben, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Coumarin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Protein / Sweet Almond Protein, Hexyl Cinnamal, Glycerin, Parfum / Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Love this stuff !
reviews.comments: Lancome I hope you never discontinue this product.  Its my favorite ðŸ’•

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this again
reviews.comments: I have used this product for years and I love it ðŸ’ž

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: The best

reviews.headline: Wonderful product
reviews.comments: This is the best makeup remover out there.  It takes off even long wearing makeup and does not feel greasy or uncomfortable.   It is fragranced, which I personally love, but if you prefer a fragrance free product, you might not like this one.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: I can't believe LancÃ´me is discontinuing this facial soap, I tried to order on their website not available it says, I was so HAPPY to see this on your Ulta website, I have been using this soap for 25 years, after I use this up I'll have to find a new soap thank you ULTA for carrying it

reviews.headline: Waste of money. Didn't cleanse OR remove makeup
reviews.comments: This didn't remove my makeup. There was a cream and makeup residue left after washing with this. And it didn't remove my eye makeup! I was left with raccoon eyes. I'll be going back to my beloved Korres face wash.

reviews.headline: Been using for years!  Love it!
reviews.comments: Happy with product, service & turn around time of my online order from Ulta.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I am a skin care specialist and was blown away the first time I used this product. It is amazing for older skin and helps with all the concerns older skin has. I highly recommend this product for anyone who wants to remove their makeup in the healthiest way possible.

reviews.headline: No,sorry it's not good to my skin
reviews.comments: It was fine to my skin. But it gave me more pimple .Makes me felt worry i don't know why?

reviews.headline: What is with all the good reviews?
reviews.comments:
I do not wear a ton of make up and it's not often very hard to remove my makeup. I usually use the mouse radiance by Lancome and I decided to try this one for the winter time because my skin was a little drier. 

I could not get my make up to budge, especially my mascara!! I was left with smudgy, smeary raccoon eyes. So then I would put more of this cleanser on, try all over again and it still would not remove my make up. One time I even used a toner with cotton pads to see how much make up was left, and it was just alarming!  Yuck. 

I wanted something gentle, but if it's not effective why bother? 

I would say the milky creaminess of this feels so good on your skinâ€¦. It is very soothing. So, that said, if you need something very gentle and don't wear make up or apply it extremely light? Then this might be for you. I am throwing away about 3/4 of this pump, and I feel like I've washed my money down the drain with the cleanser.

reviews.headline: Good makeup remover, but not for eyes
reviews.comments: I actually like this product since it only takes a pump or two to melt my makeup or SPF off my face before cleansing. The only issue (which is a dealbreaker for me) is that the formula seems to burn/irritate my skin and especially around the eye area. I was really hoping for this to be a great double cleanser/all around makeup remover but it really fell flat with the irritation. If Lancome reworked the formula to include eye area testing (in another question they stated they did not test this product for the eyes) that would be a GAME CHANGER. Personally. I think any makeup remover should at least not irritate the eyes.

reviews.headline: Smells like an old lady
reviews.comments: I would rather have an un-scented product to clean my face. It broke me out in acne. Give it to your grandma

reviews.headline: I !use this daily and won't be without it!  It's awesome!
reviews.comments: This is a product to use every day.  It is great for smooth skin.
reviews.nickname: Please do not include my name.

reviews.headline: Great product butâ€¦â€¦
reviews.comments: This is a wonderful product for removing makeup. However, the sales person states that it also "cleans the skin" and therefore only one product is needed. It removes makeup but you will need to use a "cleanser" to get your face really clean.

reviews.headline: Kind of disappointed....
reviews.comments: I was really excited to use this cleanser but I don't feel like take my make up off very well. I have to use several pumps and tons of tissue.

reviews.headline: An old favorite
reviews.comments: I have used this product for years and love it!  It does not require water, but I usually finish with a damp cloth to get the last bit off. My skin feels clean but not dry.

reviews.headline: I will forever be buying this product!
reviews.comments: Leaves your skin silky smooth and I use it twice a day.

reviews.headline: Makes Removing Makeup a Pleasure
reviews.comments: Performs so well and is so enjoyable to use, it makes removing makeup more of a pleasure than a chore. Works alone as a gentle, single step if no makeup was worn, or as a first step to very effectively break down makeup, even mascara, before cleanser. As with all things Lancome, Galatee Confort smells nice and feels luxurious, and even the beautiful bottle contributes to the sensory experience. Leaves skin feeling clean, dewy and yes, comforted. Tres bien!

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: Not a cleanser at all. It's a cream and the fragrance isn't appealing. Face feels filmy and not clean after using. Definitely will be returning.

reviews.headline: yes , i love it
reviews.comments: all the time

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Doesn't irritate dry and sensitive skin.

display_values: Doesn't irritate dry and sensitive skin.

faceoff_positive.comments:
This is one of the best cleansers and makeup removes I've found. 
I usually use the Lancome comfort face wash with the pink lettering(can't remember the name), but decided to switch to this since it's much larger(though the small one of the other normally lasts me almost a year).

My skin is prone to dryness,flaking,and irritation, especially as the colder months roll around. I use this at night as a makeup remover and cleanser and ot noticeably shrinks my pores and makes my skin silky smooth,soft,and hydrated. I of course still use toner and moisturizer afterwards, but I no longer need to wear a daily moisturizing mask or heavy cream to bed.

I wake up still with smooth, clean and clear looking skin. I have sensitive skin and this is non-irritating; it's actually soothing.
In the AM I use Hada Labo Gokujyun cream cleanser which feels very nice, but I love this so much that I'm considering fully switching over for winter.

Definitely recommend for dry,sensitive,flaky,cold- irritated, or mature skin.
It has a scent(almondy), but it isn't very strong. Cleans well without stripping oils, feels like lotion, great gentle makeup remover and cleanser.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best cleanser for dry skin
